name: SPACE 4.2
description:
SPACE 4 is a simple space shooter where you shoot satalites to get ammo and time!

Watch Gameplay: https://www.twitch.tv/videos/262425770

With the update 1.9.2 we removed the Dropboxes to ensure a faster Gameplay.

We later plan to bring also a Linux edition out.

Controls:

W and S = up and down

D and A = stearing

C = change the camera

P = pause

Supported Controllers: Xbox 360 Controller, Xbox One Controller

Made with the Unreal Engine 4  and Blender.
